title: Gordonsville moves festival to fairgrounds
content:
Autumn is here, and that means the Gordonsville Street Festival can’t be far behind. 
  
The 37th Annual Gordonsville Street Festival is scheduled for Oct. 3, from 9 a.m. to 4 p.m., and since Main Street, its traditional location, is under construction, will move to the Gordonsville Volunteer Fire Company (GVFC) fairgrounds.
